name: Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Master Controller
short_description:
THIS IS REUPLOAD. IT STILL WORK BUT THE PROJECT SITE IS DOWN.

Hello! This is a Program for JazzJackrabbit2 game where you can add more extrass iclude scripting. To work these scripts they need JJM client.

What is JazzJackrabbit2?
JazzJackrabbit2 is a game where you can make own levels. Even you can play over The Internet.
More Info : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jazz_Jackrabbit_2.

System requirements:
the slowest pc was tested JJM was had:
	CPU: 500Mhz
	RAM: 256MB
	Graphic Ram: 16MB
JJM need Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7 to run.
Adobe Flash Player must be installed to run JJM (if you install Flash with Firefox it can be possible that JJM is still crashing)
Install Flash with Internet Explorer or run JJMAU.exe in the Temp folder.
The installer need Windows XP to work
